cgcloud__Order_Payment_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Order_Payment_Template__c
cgcloud__Order_Payment_Template__c.description: Holds the attributes of the order payment template.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Account_Required__c.description: Defines the necessity of an account number.

cgcloud__Bank_Code_Required__c.description: Defines the necessity of a bank code.

cgcloud__CSC_Required__c.description: Defines the necessity of a card security code.

cgcloud__Debit_Credit_Payment__c.description: Indicates whether the template is used for incoming payments or outgoing payments. Empty item is added to the UI to configure inventory transfer documents (at tour start or end). Toggle check is disabled.

cgcloud__Effective_Date_Required__c.description: Defines the necessity of an effective date.

cgcloud__Expiration_Date_Required__c.description: Defines the necessity of an expiration date.

cgcloud__Holder_Name_Required__c.description: Defines the necessity of an account holder.

cgcloud__Institute_Required__c.description: Defines the necessity of a name for the institute.

cgcloud__Item_Number_Required__c.description: Defines the necessity of a number for the means of payment.

cgcloud__Payment_Modification_Reason__c.description: Picklist values that define the need for modification of payment.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales org that the order template belongs to.
